entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @marcorubio The USA 🇺🇸 have failed the world on the fight against COVID19 pandemic. By disbanded the WH house Global Pandemic Team, GOP/Rubio allowed Trump to do that. Withdraw scientists from Wuhan! Let Trump spent that budget of $200m on the wall.
